title:
Sharp quantitative stability estimates for critical points of fractional
  Sobolev inequalities
authors: Haixia Chen, Seunghyeok Kim, and Juncheng Wei
abstract:
By developing a unified approach based on integral representations, we
establish sharp quantitative stability estimates for critical points of the
fractional Sobolev inequalities induced by the embedding $\dot{H}^s({\mathbb
R}^n) \hookrightarrow L^{2n \over n-2s}({\mathbb R}^n)$ in the whole range of
$s \in (0,\frac{n}{2})$.
